title: Two bedroom in Historic Pet-friendly Building! 780 Post St #7
posting_body: This building is listed in the national register of historic places
Within blocks of muni bus lines: 2, 3, 19, 38, 38r, 27, 31, 47, 49
Public transit (bart): short walk powell and civic center stations
Nearby : bread & butter market & deli, 24 hour fitness, hertz car rental, fedex/kinkos, bevmo
Two most recent pay stubs (or circle direct deposits on your bank statements)
Positive rental and credit history (minimum 600 credit score required)
Gross monthly income = 3 times the rent
780 Post St. is a 11 minute walk from the J CHURCH, the KT INGLESIDE/THIRD and the L TARAVAL at the Metro Powell Station/Outbound stop.
This apartment is in the Downtown neighborhood in San Francisco.
Nearby parks include O'Farrell-Larkin Mini-Park, Boeddeker Park and Parklet.
It has a Walk Score of 98 out of 100.
This location is a Walker's Paradise so daily errands do not require a car.
Nearby schools include San Francisco Flex Academy, Redding Elementary School and San Francisco City Academy.
The closest grocery stores are Food & Liquor World, Crown Market & Liquor and Star Market & Deli.
Nearby coffee shops include Farm Table, Organic Coffee and Paris Cafe.
There are 444 restaurants within a 15 minute walk including Pomidor Restaurant & BA, iThai and Pearl's Deluxe Burgers.
780 Post St. is near O'Farrell-Larkin Mini-Park, Boeddeker Park and Huntington Park.
There are excellent bike lanes and the terrain has very steep hills.
780 Post St. is very bikeable, biking is convenient for most trips.
